name: DYNASTY WARRIORS 9: Season Pass 3 / シーズンパス３
detailed_description:
Offering a discount pass that includes various additional content available for DYNASTY WARRIORS 9.
DLC that will be available during the period of February 2019 through April 2019 can be purchased at a discount.
Also, everyone who purchases Season Pass 3 will receive a Season Pass 3 Bonus.

■Content included
Additional Costumes (16)
Additional Weapons (6)
Additional Scenarios (4)
Additional Scenario Costumes (4)

■Limited Bonus for Purchasers
Season Pass 3 Bonus

▼How to use
To receive the item, talk with a Trader at one of the cities within the game and select DLC.

short_description: Offering a discount pass that includes various additional content available for DYNASTY WARRIORS 9. DLC that will be available during the period of February 2019 through April 2019 can be purchased at a discount.

fullgame.name: DYNASTY WARRIORS 9 真・三國無双８

supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil, Korean, Japanese*, Simplified Chinese*, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
最低配置:
  • 操作系统: Windows 7/8.1/10 64bit
  • 处理器: Core i5 2400 or over
  • 内存: 6 GB RAM
  • 图形: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660 or over
  • DirectX 版本: 11
  • 网络: 宽带互联网连接
  • 存储空间: 需要 50 GB 可用空间
  • 声卡: 16 bit stereo, 48KHz WAVE file can be played
pc_requirements.recommended:
推荐配置:
  • 操作系统: Windows 7/8.1/10 64bit
  • 处理器: Core i7 3770 or over
  • 内存: 8 GB RAM
  • 图形: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 or over
  • DirectX 版本: 11
  • 网络: 宽带互联网连接
  • 存储空间: 需要 50 GB 可用空间
  • 声卡: 16bit 5.1ch Surround, 48KHz WAVE file can be played
